courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Restricted to first-year freshmen and transfer students.
description: Interdisciplinary Grand Challenge Learning course in the Inequality and Cultural Understanding Pathway. Exploration of causes and solutions to inequality from a variety of viewpoints, such as sociology, economics, political science, and journalism. Includes experiential learning projects. Topics vary by section. Prerequisite: Restricted to first-year freshmen and transfer students.
label: Social Justice in the Social Sciences
sectionCappArea: Restricted to First Time Freshman or Transfer student - first time students.
sectionDegreeAttributes: Grand Challenge-Inequality, Social Sciences, and US Minority Culture(s) course.
